QuestData.Title: To the Garrison
QuestData.Description: My father is avenged. The sons of the Iron Wolf are all slain.$b$bGo to the garrison your people are constructing in the south. There, herald my return to my laggard brother.$b$bThe time has come for the "chieftain" to be reminded of what it means to be a Frostwolf.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Durotan in front of your garrison in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Durotan in front of your garrison in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: Ga'nar is coming. Good. We need his forces if we are to press the advantage.$b$bI can only hope his bloodlust has quelled enough for him to listen to reason.
